 Must be overwritten by the theme for drawing the tab control.

Detailed Description

Describes the view of a tab control. The drawing of the tab buttons is done by an instance of the class TabButtonView.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

TabControlView::TabControlView (  XYDIM  border_size,
XYDIM  header_height = 0
) 
 

Parameters:
border_size Size of the border in pixels between the tab control boundaries and the embedded pages.
header_height Height of the header in pixels. The header can be enabled by TabControl::SetHeaderEnabled. If the header height is <= 0, the height of the font defined by Font::Client is used.

DeviceContext *  dc,
const Rect &  repaint_rect
)  const [protected, pure virtual]
 

Must be overwritten by the theme for drawing the tab control.

Implemented in DefaultTabControlView.

XYDIM TabControlView::GetBorderSize (   )  const [inline]
 

Returns the size of the tab border in pixels. The tab border is defined as the area between the tab control boundaries and the embedded pages.

XYDIM TabControlView::GetHeaderHeight (   )  const [inline]
 

Returns the height of the header in pixels. The header can be enabled by TabControl::SetHeaderEnabled.
